remarks: A function is finitely supported from ` B ` to ` A ` iff the extended function is finitely supported from ` D ` to ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2015.)
statement:
cantnfs.s $e |- S = dom ( A CNF B ) $.
cantnfs.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cantnfs.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
cantnfrescl.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. On ) $.
cantnfrescl.b $e |- ( ph -> B C_ D ) $.
cantnfrescl.x $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. ( D \ B ) ) -> X = (/) ) $.
cantnfrescl.a $e |- ( ph -> (/) e. A ) $.
cantnfrescl.t $e |- T = dom ( A CNF D ) $.
cantnfrescl $p |- ( ph -> ( ( n e. B |-> X ) e. S <-> ( n e. D |-> X ) e. T ) ) $.
$d A n $.
$d B n $.
$d D n $.
$d n ph $.
